name: Ömit Mê
description:
**Playable but still under heavy development**

Current Version: 0.02

Welcome to Omit Me, a single-player, first-person, deeply psychological experience. It is inspired by games such as The Beginner's Guide for its emotional story; Portal for its puzzles and background storyline; and Unturned for its low polymer design and beautiful landscapes.

Updates weekly.

This game is far from finished, to support this game please consider donating to our kickstarter. 

For any business inquires please contact us at: brightfiregames@gmail.com
